TopicTitle: Can you decrease your transfer loss?

Articles.Content: As i have been playing career mode for a while, i began to hate the transfer loss in science when transmitting. is there a way to decrease that loss? if yes, HOW:huh:
Transfer loss seems to be a fixed value by experiment type ... insofar I would say that the answer is "No"

It actually makes sense to have that penalty: For example, the Mystery Goo is much more valuable for scientists if they can analyze it themselves, instead of just looking at photos and reading/hearing a description of the look, viscosity, and smell.

In other words: Embrace the challenge and try to come up with return missions.
